overview: In 1989 the idea of a band was planted in the minds of three friends. Three years later, this idea became a reality with the addition of new friends and band members. But when you are a teenager, it's hard to have your creativity taken seriously. With nowhere to play and no scene to be a part of, what do you do?  You build one yourself.
tagline: Friends creating music, Music creating the scene, The band did break down
title: Breakdown
